actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Crime and Criminal Justice

official_title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to require that persons comply with State and local firearms licensing laws before receiving a Federal license to deal in firearms.

summary.text: Amends the Federal criminal code to require that any individual seeking a Federal license to deal in firearms comply with State and local firearms licensing laws and submit a written statement signed by the chief of police of the locality or county sheriff certifying that the information available to the signer of the statement does not indicate that the applicant is ineligible to obtain such a license under the law of such State and locality.

titles.title: To amend title 18, United States Code, to require that persons comply with State and local firearms licensing laws before receiving a Federal license to deal in firearms.
